documents.document: as good as usual ! great wee hotel in the DAM hey all , this is my 4th or 5th stay in the Nadia. The more I stay there the more I enjoy it , it is a small family hotel no hassle , always friendly , close enough to the action in the Coffee shops, shopping and redlight district BUT without being too close ! I would highly recommend this Hotel ( PS not for the hard of walking, the steps up to the rooms are a bit steep)email me if you wish weemuppet@hotmail.com
